metadata.title: Wednesday, 27th September, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the contractor who was working on the Fungulwe road in Lufwanyama Parliamentary Constituency demobilised, leaving the road in a deplorable condition;
(b) at what level of completion, in percentage terms, the project was, as of October, 2022;
(c) what the contract sum was; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a university in Katete District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to connect the following institutions in Chitambo District to the national electricity grid:
(i) Katikulula Resettlement Scheme Phase II Mini Hospital; (ii) Mwimbula Mini Hospital; and (iii) Lisenga Secondary School (under the Zambia Education Enhancement Project);
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) what the annual fish production is, countrywide;
(b) what measures are being taken to increase the production; and

(c) when fish production is expected to increase, arising from the measures at (b). NOTICE OF MOTION Mr.Mwila Introduce Legislation Providing for the welfare of former freedom fighters in the country: That this House urges the Government to introduce legislation providing for the welfare of former freedom fighters in the country. ORDER OF THE DAY 1 Thanks –His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (13th September) - Resumption of Debate. ___________________________
